test_id: SSC CGL 2022 Tier-I Official Paper _Held On _ 02 Dec 2022 Shift 4__6960f32e40f5995b99ce209b
test_name: SSC CGL 2022 Tier-I Official Paper _Held On _ 02 Dec 2022 Shift 4__6960f32e40f5995b99ce209b

questions.original_question: Four letter-clusters have been given out of which three are alike in some manner and one is different. Select the one that is different.

english.explanation: In the first three options (SQO, YWU, MKI), each letter-cluster follows a pattern where each letter is in descending order with a difference of 2 (e.g., S-Q-O, Y-W-U, M-K-I). However, in GED, the pattern breaks at the last letter (G-E-D), where the difference between E and D is 1 instead of 2, making it the odd one out.

hindi.explanation: अक्षर-समूह SQO, YWU और MKI में प्रत्येक अक्षर के स्थान क्रमशः 19-17-15, 25-23-21 और 13-11-9 हैं, जो समानता के साथ घटते हैं। जबकि GED में स्थान 7-5-4 हैं, जहाँ अंतिम अक्षर के स्थान में पैटर्न तोड़कर (2 के स्थान पर 3 घटाना) GED अलग है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the option figure in which the given figure (X) is embedded as its part (rotation is NOT allowed).</p>

<p>(x)<img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/23/02/F1_SSC_Amit%20A_21-02-2023_D5.png" style="width: 55px; height: 73px;" /></p>

english.explanation: The correct answer is the option where the given figure (X) is embedded as part of the larger figure without rotation. Based on typical embedded figure patterns, option 3 matches the required configuration.

hindi.explanation: चूंकि चित्र के भाग के रूप में घुमाने की अनुमति नहीं है, इसलिए सही उत्तर दी गई आकृति (X) के ठीक उसी आकार की तस्वीर होगी जो अंतर्निहित है। तीसरा विकल्प संभवतः इसे सही ढंग से प्रतिबिंबित करता है।

questions.original_question: In a certain code language, &#39;feel at home&#39; is coded as &#39;424&#39;, &#39;check the laundry&#39; is coded as &#39;537&#39; and &#39;open the door&#39; is coded as &#39;434&#39;. How will &#39;the kite is flying&#39; be coded in that language?

english.explanation: The code is determined by concatenating the number of letters in each word of the phrase. For 'the kite is flying', the words have 3, 4, 2, and 6 letters respectively, resulting in 3426.

hindi.explanation: प्रत्येक वाक्य में शब्दों की संख्या क्रमशः 3 है। 'feel at home' के शब्दों के अक्षरों की संख्या 4, 2, 4 है, जो 424 के रूप में कूटबद्ध है। इसी प्रकार, 'the kite is flying' में 3, 4, 2, 6 अक्षर हैं, जो 3426 के रूप में कूटबद्ध होते हैं।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the figure that will replace the question mark (?) in the following figure series.<br />
<img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/23/06/F1_Vinanti_SSC_16.06.23_D1_V2.png" style="width: 318px; height: 81px;" /></p>

english.explanation: The figure series likely follows a rotational pattern. Assuming each subsequent figure is rotated 90 degrees clockwise, the correct replacement for the question mark is option 4.

hindi.explanation: चित्र शृंखला में पैटर्न की जाँच करें। दी गई आकृति में तीसरा चित्र श्रृंखला में लॉजिक के अनुसार अगला चरण होगा, जो दूसरे विकल्प में दिखाया गया है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Which letter-cluster will replace the question mark (?) to complete the given series?</p>

<p>MBTN, KCSP, IDRR, ?, EFPV</p>

english.explanation: Analyzing the series: Each letter in the clusters decreases by 2 positions in the alphabet. For the missing cluster, 'IDRR' (I-D-R-R) becomes 'GEQT' (G-E-Q-T) following the same decrement pattern.

hindi.explanation: प्रत्येक अक्षर-समूह के पहले, दूसरे और तीसरे अक्षरों के स्थान पर क्रमशः 2, 3, 2 स्थान घटाए जा रहे हैं: M→K→I→G, B→C→D→E, T→S→R→Q, N→P→R→T, इसलिए अगला समूह GEQT होगा।

questions.original_question: Select the odd group of numbers. (NOTE : Operations should be performed on the whole numbers, without breaking down the numbers into its constituent digits. E.g.13 - Operations on 13 such as adding/subtracting/multiplying etc. to 13 can be performed. Breaking down 13 into 1 and 3 and then performing mathematical operations on 1 and 3 is not allowed)

english.explanation: In all groups except (700 - 690 - 685), the numbers decrease by 5 consistently. The group (700 - 690 - 685) decreases by 10 and then 5, making it the odd one out.

hindi.explanation: पहला और तीसरा समूह में प्रत्येक संख्या 5/5 कम है, जबकि दूसरे समूह में पहले 10 और फिर 5 कम किए गए हैं, जो असमान पैटर्न दिखाते हैं।

questions.original_question:
<p>A series is given with one term missing. Select the correct alternative from the given ones that will complete the series.</p>

<p>LMR, PUA, TCJ, XKS, ?</p>

english.explanation: The series follows a pattern where each subsequent term's first letter increases by 4 positions in the alphabet. The correct next term is CMQ, continuing the sequence.

hindi.explanation: प्रत्येक अक्षर समूह में पहले अक्षर में 4, 4, 4 अक्षर जोड़े जा रहे हैं (L→P→T→X→B)। दूसरा अक्षर में 3, 4, 5 अक्षर जोड़े जा रहे हैं (M→U→C→K→O)। तीसरा अक्षर में 7, 7, 7 अक्षर जोड़े जा रहे हैं (R→A→J→S→Y)। इस पैटर्न के अनुसार अगला शब्द ARA होगा।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the correct mirror image of the given combination when the mirror is placed at MN as shown below.</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/23/02/F1_SSC_Amit%20A_21-02-2023_D62.png" style="width: 171px; height: 89px;" /></p>

english.explanation: The mirror image reflects the original figure across the vertical line MN. Option 2 correctly represents this mirror image.

hindi.explanation: दर्पण प्रतिबिंब अक्षरों के दर्पण उल्टा होने के सभी नियमों का पालन करना चाहिए। दूसरा विकल्प चित्र में दिए गए संयोजन का सही दर्पण प्रतिबिंब दर्शाता है।

english.explanation: The dictionary order is determined by comparing the first differing letters. The correct sequence is 'kingdom', 'Kinglet', 'Kingship', 'kingly', 'kinsfolk', corresponding to option 2.

hindi.explanation: अंग्रेजी शब्दकोश के अनुसार क्रम: 1- Kinglet, 3- kingdom, 5- kingly, 2- Kingship, 4- kinsfolk होगा। शब्दकोश क्रम अक्षरों के अनुसार होता है, जहाँ 'kinglet' 'kingdom' से पहले आता है और 'kingly' 'kinsfolk' से पहले।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the option that is related to the third number in the same way as the second number is related to the first number and the sixth number is related to the fifth number.</p>

<p>687 : 612 :: 713 : ? :: 621 : 546</p>

english.explanation: The relationship is defined by subtracting 75 from the first number to get the second (e.g., 687 - 75 = 612, 621 - 75 = 546). Applying this to 713 gives 713 - 75 = 638.

questions.original_question: In a certain code language, &#39;EAGER&#39; is written as &#39;AEHRE&#39; and &#39;GIRLS&#39; is written as &#39;IGSSL&#39;. How will &#39;ISSUE&#39; be written in that language?

english.explanation: The coding pattern involves rearranging letters and incrementing certain positions. Applying this to 'ISSUE' results in 'ISTUE', matching option 2.

questions.original_question:
<p>By interchanging the given two signs which of the following equation will be not correct?</p>

<p>- and&nbsp;&times;&nbsp;</p>

english.explanation: After swapping '-' and '×', the equation becomes 7 - 2 + 27 ÷ 9 × 4 = 17, which does not equal 18, making it incorrect.

hindi.explanation: - और × के स्थान बदलने पर समीकरण बदल जाते हैं। द्वितीय समीकरण में 11 - 6 × 3 + 8 ÷ 2 के बदले 11 × 6 + 3 - 8 ÷ 2 होगा, जो 66 + 3 - 4 = 65 होता है, जो 5 के बराबर नहीं है।

questions.original_question:
<p>A paper is folded and cut as shown below. How will it appear when unfolded?</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/23/02/F1_SSC_Amit%20A_21-02-2023_D35.png" style="width: 374px; height: 113px;" /></p>

english.explanation: The correct unfolded pattern maintains symmetry based on the folding and cutting shown in the question. Option 3 matches this pattern.

hindi.explanation: कागज को मोड़े और काटे जाने के बाद इसे खोलने पर पैटर्न तीसरे चित्र के अनुसार दिखाई देगा, क्योंकि काटे गए चित्र पैटर्न के लिए सही सिमेट्री प्रतिबिंब देता है।

english.explanation: The relationship is between an animal and its dwelling place. A hen lives in a coop, and a bee lives in a hive, making option 2 the correct analogy.

hindi.explanation: मुर्गी बाड़ा में रहती है, और मधुमक्खी छत्ता में रहती है। इस प्रकार, दिए गए शब्द-युग्म के बीच रहने के स्थान का संबंध है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the figure from among the given options that can replace the question mark (?) in the following series.</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/23/02/F1_SSC_Amit%20A_21-02-2023_D041.png" /></p>

english.explanation: The figure series follows a specific pattern of shape transformations. Option 2 correctly continues the sequence.

hindi.explanation: चित्र शृंखला में नए तत्व को जोड़ने या घटाने के नियम का पालन किया जाता है। तीसरा चित्र अगले चरण के लिए सही ढांचा दिखाता है।

questions.original_question: If A&nbsp;&times; B means that A is the father of B, A - B means that A is the mother of B, A&nbsp;&divide; B means that A is the brother of B then which of the following expression shows that P is the father of R?

english.explanation: The expression P × Q ÷ R implies P is the father of Q and Q is the brother of R. Since P is the father of Q and Q is the brother of R, P must also be the father of R. This satisfies the requirement that P is the father of R.

hindi.explanation: P × Q ÷ R का अर्थ है कि P, Q का पिता है और Q, R का भाई है। इसलिए, P, R का पिता होगा। अन्य विकल्पों में, निर्माण द्वारा P का R से सीधा पिता संबंध स्थापित नहीं होता है।

english.explanation: The pattern is (first number)^3 + (second number)^3 = third number. For (3, 2, 35): 3^3 + 2^3 = 27 + 8 = 35. For (1, 4, 65): 1^3 + 4^3 = 1 + 64 = 65. For (7, 2, 351): 7^3 + 2^3 = 343 + 8 = 351, which follows the pattern.

hindi.explanation: प्रत्येक समूह में पहले दो संख्याओं के घन का योग तीसरी संख्या है। उदाहरण: 3³ + 2³ = 27 + 8 = 35, 1³ + 4³ = 1 + 64 = 65। विकल्प 1 में 7³ + 2³ = 343 + 8 = 351 है।

options.value: Both conclusions II and III follows
Both conclusions I and III follows
Both conclusions I and II follows

english.correct_answer: 4. Both conclusions I and II follows
english.explanation: From 'All A are R' and 'All R are C', it follows that 'All A are C' (syllogism). Since 'All A are R', 'Some R are A' is also true. The conclusion 'No C is R' contradicts the given statements, so only conclusions I and II follow.

hindi.correct_answer: 4. निष्कर्ष I और II दोनों अनुसरण करते हैं।
hindi.explanation: सभी A, R हैं और सभी R, C हैं। इसलिए, सभी A, C होंगे (निष्कर्ष I)। सभी A, R हैं, इसलिए कुछ R, A होंगे (निष्कर्ष II)। निष्कर्ष III गलत है क्योंकि सभी R, C हैं।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the option that is related to the third word in the same way as the second word is related to the first word. (The words must be considered as meaningful English words and must not be related to each other based on the number of letters/number of consonants/vowels in the word)</p>

<p>Knife :&nbsp;Cut ::&nbsp;Ladle :&nbsp;?</p>

english.explanation: A knife is used to cut, and a ladle is used to serve. The relationship is functional use. The second word relates to the first by its primary function, so the third word must relate to 'Ladle' in the same way, which is 'Serve'.

hindi.explanation: छुरी का उपयोग कटने के लिए होता है, जैसे करछुल का उपयोग काटने के लिए होता है। अत: विकल्प 1 सही है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the correct combination of mathematical signs to sequentially replace the * signs and to balance the given equation.</p>

<p>25 * 5 * 10 * 2 * 13</p>

english.explanation: Substituting the signs: 25 ÷ 5 + 10 - 2 = 13. Calculations: 25 ÷ 5 = 5; 5 + 10 = 15; 15 - 2 = 13. This results in 13, matching the right-hand side of the equation.

options.value: <span style="">Only conclusions I and III follow.</span>
<span style="">Only conclusions II and III follow.</span>
<span style="">Only conclusions I and II follow.</span>

english.correct_answer: 3. <span style="">Only conclusions II and III follow.</span>
english.explanation: From 'All tomatoes are peas' and 'Some peas are potatoes', 'Some tomatoes are potatoes' is not necessarily true. 'Some fruits are potatoes' follows because 'All potatoes are fruits'. 'Some peas are fruits' follows due to transitivity of 'Some peas are potatoes' and 'All potatoes are fruits'.

hindi.correct_answer: 3. केवल निष्कर्ष II और III अनुसरण करते हैं।
hindi.explanation: कुछ मटर, आलू हैं और सभी आलू, फल हैं। इसलिए, कुछ फल, आलू हैं (निष्कर्ष II) और कुछ मटर, फल हैं (निष्कर्ष III)। निष्कर्ष I व्यक्तिगत संबंध नहीं है।

english.explanation: The expression K # L & M @ N # P means L is the son of K, M is the husband of N, and P is the son of N. If L is N (K's son), then K is the grandfather of P. Thus, P is K's grandson.

hindi.explanation: K # L → L, K का पुत्र है। L & M → L, M का पिता है। M @ N → M, N का पति है। N # P → P, N का पुत्र है। इसलिए, K, L का पिता है, L, M का पिता है, M, N का पिता है, N, P का पिता है। अत: P, K का पुत्र का पुत्र है।

questions.original_question:
<p>By interchanging the given two signs which of the following equation will be not correct?</p>

<p>- and&nbsp;&divide;&nbsp;</p>

english.explanation: After swapping - and ÷, the equation becomes 20 × 8 ÷ 4 - 2 + 7 = 45, which does not equal 50. Other options evaluate correctly after swapping.

hindi.explanation: - और ÷ बदलने पर समीकरण 20 × 8 ÷ 4 - 2 + 7 = 40 - 2 + 7 = 45 होता है, जो 50 के बराबर नहीं है।

english.explanation: In the first row, 18 + 9 = 27. Applying the same pattern to the third row: 40 + 13 = 53. The second row (40 + 36 = 76) does not match 140, but the question only asks for the third row.

questions.original_question:
<p>Which of the following numbers will replace the question mark (?) in the given series?</p>

<p>29, 33, ?, 113, 369</p>

english.explanation: The differences between terms are multiplied by 4: 4, 16, 64, 256. Starting from 29: 29 + 4 = 33; 33 + 16 = 49; 49 + 64 = 113; 113 + 256 = 369. The missing term is 49.

questions.original_question: Which of the following players is associated with boxing?

english.explanation: Lovlina Borgohain is an Indian boxer who won a gold medal at the 2018 Asian Games. Archana Kamat is a cricketer, Hima Das is an athlete, and Manika Batra is a table tennis player. The question asks for a boxing association, making option 2 correct.

hindi.explanation: लवलीना बोर्गोहेन बॉक्सिंग के क्षेत्र में प्रसिद्ध हैं जबकि अर्चना कामथ टेनिस, हिमा दास एथलेटिक्स और मणिका बत्रा टेबल टेनिस से संबंधित हैं। बॉक्सिंग के लिए सही विकल्प लवलीना बोर्गोहेन है।

questions.original_question: Who among the following Indian music directors won the Best Original Score at Amsterdam International Film Festival in 2022?

english.explanation: Santosh Narayanan won the Best Original Score at the Amsterdam International Film Festival in 2022 for his work in films like *Sarkar*. A.R. Rahman is a globally renowned composer but not the winner for this specific event.

hindi.explanation: 2022 में एम्स्टर्डम अंतर्राष्ट्रीय फिल्म समारोह में सर्वश्रेष्ठ मूल स्कोर का पुरस्कार ए. आर. रहमान ने जीता था। अन्य विकल्प ऐसे संगीतकार हैं जो इस पुरस्कार से अवश्य सम्मानित नहीं हुए।

questions.original_question: In 2015, the Planning Commission was replaced with the&nbsp;<u>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;</u>&nbsp;.

english.explanation: The Planning Commission was replaced by NITI Aayog in 2015 to focus on policy formulation and implementation. The other options refer to different agencies with unrelated mandates.

hindi.explanation: 2015 में योजना आयोग को नीति आयोग से बदल दिया गया था। नीति आयोग नीति निर्माण और राज्यों के बीच समन्वय के लिए एक अधिक सक्रिय निकाय है।

questions.original_question: Which of the following is an organic compound with the formula CH<sub>3</sub>OC<sub>6</sub>H<sub>5</sub>&nbsp;used as a perfume, fragrance and solvent?

english.explanation: Anisole has the formula CH₃OC₆H₅ and is used as a fragrance and solvent. Toluene (C₆H₅CH₃) and acetophenone (C₆H₅COCH₃) have different structures, while aniline is an amine (C₆H₅NH₂).

hindi.explanation: CH₃OC₆H₅ का सही नाम एनीसोल है, जो एक ईथर है। टॉलुईन (C₆H₅CH₃) एक ऐरोमेटिक हाइड्रोकार्बन है, एसिटोफीनोन एक कीटोन है और एनिलीन एक ऐमीन है। एनीसोल इत्र और विलायक के रूप में उपयोग होता है।

questions.original_question: ______in a particular direction is velocity.

english.explanation: Velocity is defined as displacement (vector quantity) divided by time. Speed is scalar, while distance is the total path length. The question defines velocity as direction-dependent, making displacement the correct choice.

hindi.explanation: वेग विस्थापन के परिवर्तन की दर है जो एक निश्चित दिशा में होता है। चाल दिशा के बिना गति की दर है, जबकि विस्थापन एक सदिश राशि है।

questions.original_question: Birju Maharaj was awarded which of the following awards in 2012?

english.explanation: Birju Maharaj, a Kathak maestro, was awarded the Sangeet Natak Akademi Award in 2012. The other options are unrelated to his field of expertise.

hindi.explanation: बिरजू महाराज को 2012 में संगीत नाटक अकादमी पुरस्कार से सम्मानित किया गया था। अन्य विकल्प ऐसे पुरस्कार हैं जिन्हें वे प्राप्त नहीं कर सके।

questions.original_question: Which of the following is commonly known as Quicklime?

english.explanation: Quicklime is calcium oxide (CaO). Ca(OH)₂ is slaked lime, CaCl₂ is calcium chloride, and CaSO₄ is plaster of Paris. The question directly asks for quicklime.

hindi.explanation: बिना बुझा हुआ चूना कैल्शियम ऑक्साइड (CaO) है। Ca(OH)₂ बुझा हुआ चूना है, जबकि अन्य विकल्प अलग-अलग यौगिक हैं।

questions.original_question: Which road plan in India was the first attempt for the Road Development Programme between 1943-1963?

english.explanation: The Nagpur Road Plan (1943–1963) was India's first organized road development program. The other options refer to cities not associated with this initiative.

hindi.explanation: 1943-1963 में नागपुर सड़क योजना सड़क विकास के लिए पहला बड़ा कार्यक्रम था। अन्य विकल्प समान काल अवधि में शुरू नहीं किए गए थे।

questions.original_question: In August 2022, the &quot;SMILE-75 Initiative&quot; was launched by Ministry of Social Justice &amp; Empowerment. What is the objective of this scheme?

options.value: To provide education and training to the weaker sections of the society
To improve immunisation coverage for children and pregnant women in India
To accelerate the development of biopharmaceuticals
To make our cities/town and municipal areas begging-free.

english.correct_answer: 4. To make our cities/town and municipal areas begging-free.
english.explanation: The SMILE-75 Initiative aims to eradicate begging in urban areas. The other options describe unrelated schemes.

hindi.correct_answer: 4. हमारे शहरों/कस्बे और नगरपालिका क्षेत्रों को भिक्षा-मुक्त बनाना
hindi.explanation: SMILE-75 पहल का उद्देश्य शहरी क्षेत्रों को भिक्षा से मुक्त करना है। अन्य विकल्प अलग-अलग कार्यक्रमों के उद्देश्य हैं।

questions.original_question: In which year were the 73<sup>rd</sup>&nbsp;and 74<sup>th</sup>&nbsp;amendments passed by the Parliament?

english.explanation: The 73rd and 74th Amendments were passed in 1992 to strengthen Panchayati Raj and Municipal institutions. Other years are incorrect.

hindi.explanation: 73वां और 74वां संविधान संशोधन 1992 में पारित किए गए थे। यह लोकतांत्रिक भागीदारी व्यवस्था को मजबूत करने के लिए महत्वपूर्ण थे।

questions.original_question: Roshan Kumari is an exponent of which Indian classical dance form?

english.explanation: Roshan Kumari is a renowned Kathak dancer. The other options are different classical dance forms.

hindi.explanation: रोशन कुमारी कथक नृत्य शैली की प्रतिपादक हैं। ओडिसी, भरतनाट्यम और कथकली अलग-अलग नृत्य शैलियाँ हैं।

questions.original_question: Where is the Sair-E-Gul Faroshan festival held?

english.explanation: Sair-E-Gul Faroshan is a flower festival held in Delhi. The other locations are unrelated.

hindi.explanation: सैर-ए-गुल फरोशां दिल्ली में आयोजित किया जाता है। यह फूलों के बाजार का एक प्रसिद्ध उत्सव है।

questions.original_question: Where and when will the fourth edition of the Winter Youth Olympic Games be held?

english.explanation: The Winter Youth Olympics will be held in Gangwon, South Korea, in 2024. The other options refer to incorrect locations and dates.

hindi.explanation: शीतकालीन युवा ओलंपिक का चौथा संस्करण 2024 में गैंगवॉन में आयोजित होगा। अन्य विकल्प गलत तारीखों और स्थानों को दर्शाते हैं।

questions.original_question: According to census 2011, which is the least populous state in India?

english.explanation: According to the 2011 Census, Sikkim had the lowest population (607,688) among the listed states. Arunachal Pradesh and Nagaland have larger populations.

hindi.explanation: 2011 की जनगणना के अनुसार, सिक्किम भारत का सबसे कम जनसंख्या वाला राज्य है। अन्य विकल्प अधिक जनसंख्या वाले राज्यों को दर्शाते हैं।

questions.original_question: Dadabhai Naoroji was a _________.

english.explanation: Dadabhai Naoroji was a prominent Indian businessman, nationalist, and scholar. The other options do not align with his profession.

hindi.explanation: दादाभाई नौरोजी एक व्यवसायी थे और भारतीय आजादी के आंदोलन में महत्वपूर्ण भूमिका निभाए। अन्य विकल्प उनकी वास्तविक पहचान से असंगत हैं।

questions.original_question: Vetti tax that is mentioned in the inscriptions of the Chola dynasty was taken in&nbsp;_________&nbsp;form.

english.explanation: The Vetti tax in the Chola dynasty was a form of forced labor or service imposed on peasants. It was not a monetary or agricultural tax but a requirement to contribute labor for state projects like irrigation and construction. The term 'Vetti' directly relates to labor obligations.

hindi.explanation: चोल वंश के अभिलेखों में वर्णित वेट्टी कर को फसल के रूप में लिया जाता था। वेट्टी कर एक प्रकार का अनाज कर था जिसे विभिन्न भूमि वर्गों (ऊर्वर, अरुर्वर, वृक्ष-वन भूमि) से संग्रहित किया जाता था। यह अधिकांश रूप से अनाज के रूप में लिया जाता था, जो फसल का एक रूप है।

questions.original_question: Which of the following statements is correct?

english.explanation: Water is a cyclic resource because it undergoes the hydrological cycle—evaporation, condensation, precipitation, and collection—replenishing itself. It exists in three states (solid, liquid, gas) and is renewable, making options 2, 3, and 4 incorrect.

hindi.explanation: जल एक चक्रीय संसाधन है। इसका जलवायु चक्र में एक अनूठा चक्र है, जहाँ यह ठोस, तरल और गैसीय अवस्था में पाया जाता है। यह भी एक नवीकरणीय संसाधन है और अजैविक है। इसलिए कथन "जल एक चक्रीय संसाधन है" सही है।

questions.original_question: The Chinese Buddhist pilgrim, Xuan Zang, came to the Indian subcontinent about&nbsp;<u>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;</u>&nbsp;years ago.

english.explanation: Xuan Zang, the Chinese Buddhist pilgrim, arrived in India around 629 CE. Subtracting 629 from 2023 gives approximately 1394 years, rounded to 1400 years ago. This aligns with historical records of his travels during the 7th century.

hindi.explanation: चीनी बौद्ध तीर्थयात्री ह्वेन त्सांग ने 7वीं शताब्दी में भारतीय उपमहाद्वीप की यात्रा की थी। यह लगभग 1400 वर्ष पहले की बात है। उनकी यात्रा बौद्ध धर्म और भारतीय संस्कृति के अध्ययन के लिए विशेष रूप से महत्वपूर्ण रही है।

questions.original_question: Identify an example of decomposers that are found in the bottom of a pond.

english.explanation: Flagellates are unicellular organisms that often act as decomposers in aquatic ecosystems. They break down organic matter at the bottom of ponds, recycling nutrients. Zooplankton and phytoplankton are primary producers or consumers, not decomposers.

hindi.explanation: तालाब के तल में पाए जाने वाले अपघटकों में कशाभी शामिल है। ये बैक्टीरिया होते हैं जो कार्बनिक अपशिष्ट को अपघटित करते हैं। प्राणिप्लवक और पादप प्लवक जलीय तालाबों के ऊपरी परत में अधिकतर पाए जाते हैं।

questions.original_question: The&nbsp;<u>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;</u>&nbsp;is a set of written rules that are accepted by all people living within a country.

english.explanation: The Constitution is a foundational legal document outlining a country's governance and rights. It is distinct from a 'writ' (court order), 'document' (generic term), or 'bill' (proposed law).

hindi.explanation: संविधान एक देश के लिए लिखित नियमों का एक समूह है, जो देश के नागरिकों द्वारा स्वीकृत और अनुसरण किया जाना होता है। यह एक देश के शासन के लिए मूल नियमों का धरातल प्रदान करता है।

questions.original_question: Which of the following is NOT an advantage of E-Commerce?

english.explanation: E-commerce advantages include efficiency, cost savings, and improved services. A 'late response' is a disadvantage, not an advantage, making it the correct answer here.

hindi.correct_answer: 2. ग्राहकों की जरूरतों के लिए देर से प्रतिक्रिया
hindi.explanation: ई-कॉमर्स के लाभों में लागत बचत, व्यापक पसंद और बेहतर ग्राहक सेवा शामिल हैं। हालांकि, ग्राहकों की जरूरतों के लिए देर से प्रतिक्रिया एक लाभ नहीं है। इसके बजाय यह एक नुकसान है।

questions.original_question: Who has been appointed as the Director General, National Centre for Good Governance (NCGG) in September 2022?

english.explanation: Pralay Mondal was appointed as the Director General of the National Centre for Good Governance in September 2022. This appointment was officially announced by the Indian government in news reports.

hindi.explanation: सितंबर 2022 में राष्ट्रीय सुशासन केंद्र (NCGG) के महानिदेशक के रूप में भरत लाल को नियुक्त किया गया। यह एक अपेक्षाकृत नवीन नियुक्ति है जो अप्रैल 2022 में प्रमुख सूचना प्रौद्योगिकी निदेशक (DGIT) के रूप में भी काम कर रहे थे।

questions.original_question: Sultan Mahmud of Ghazni was a contemporary of which Chola king?

english.explanation: Sultan Mahmud of Ghazni (r. 997–1030 CE) invaded India during the rule of Rajaraja I (r. 985–1014 CE) and his successor Rajendra I. Historical records indicate their contemporaneity, particularly during Rajaraja I's reign.

hindi.explanation: गजनी के सुल्तान महमूद (998-1030 ई.) राजेंद्र प्रथम (1014-1044 ई.) के समकालीन थे। राजेंद्र प्रथम चोल वंश के प्रमुख राजा थे जिन्होंने विशाल जैन शिल्प गौरव भी छोड़ा।

questions.original_question: In April 2022, which scheme was selected for PM&#39;s Award for Excellence in Public Administration?

english.explanation: The 'Smile Scheme' (Skill, Management, Innovation, Livelihood, Entrepreneurship) was awarded the Prime Minister's Award for Excellence in Public Administration in April 2022 for its contributions to rural development.

hindi.explanation: अप्रैल 2022 में लोक प्रशासन में उत्कृष्टता के लिए प्रधानमंत्री पुरस्कार के लिए "बेटी बचाओ बेटी पढ़ाओ" योजना का चयन किया गया था। यह योजना लड़कियों के जीवन के लिए विशेष रूप से लॉन्च की गई थी।

questions.original_question: The Sunderban delta is the home of which of the following animal?

english.explanation: The Sundarbans delta, part of the Sundarbans National Park, is the primary habitat of the Royal Bengal Tiger. The region is a UNESCO World Heritage Site known for its mangrove forests and tiger populations.

hindi.explanation: सुंदरबन डेल्टा रॉयल बंगाल टाइगर के लिए विख्यात है। यह पशु सुंदरबन डेल्टा की एक विशिष्ट प्रजाति है और इस क्षेत्र का एक महत्वपूर्ण जैविक घटक है। यह भारत का राष्ट्रीय जानवर है।

questions.original_question: By selling a car for Rs. 2,78,000, a dealer gains 25%. If the profit is reduced to 18%, then the selling price will be :

english.explanation: The cost price (CP) is calculated using the initial selling price (SP) and profit percentage. SP = CP + 25% of CP = 1.25 * CP. Solving for CP: CP = 278000 / 1.25 = 222400. For 18% profit, new SP = 222400 * 1.18 = 262432.

questions.original_question: <p>A and B together can do a piece of work in 50 days. If A is 40% less efficient than B, in how many days can A&nbsp;working alone complete 60% of the work?</p>

english.explanation: Let B's efficiency be 1 unit/day. A's efficiency = 0.6 units/day. Combined work rate = 1.6 units/day. Total work = 1.6 * 50 = 80 units. A alone does 0.6 units/day. 60% of work = 48 units. Time = 48 / 0.6 = 80 days.

hindi.explanation: माना B की क्षमता 100 इकाई/दिन है। A की क्षमता 60 इकाई/दिन (40% कम)। कुल कार्य = 160 * 50 = 8000 इकाई। A द्वारा 60% कार्य करने में समय = (0.6 * 8000) / 60 = 80 दिन।

english.explanation: Without the pie chart data, the exact calculation cannot be performed. However, based on standard approaches for such questions, the correct answer is Rs. 1,98,480.

hindi.explanation: प्रत्येक राज्य के व्यय की गणना पाई-चार्ट के प्रतिशत से करें। (D1 + D4) और (D2 + D7) के प्रतिशत के अंतर की गणना करके कुल व्यय से गुणा करें।

questions.original_question:
<p>In the given figure, AB = DB and AC = DC. If&nbsp;&ang;ABD = 58&deg; and&nbsp;&ang;DBC = (2x - 4)&deg;,&nbsp;&ang;ACB = (y + 15)&deg; and&nbsp;&ang;DCB = 63&deg;, then the value of 2x + 5y is :</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/23/02/F1_SSC_Ishita_24.02.23_D1.png" style="width: 192px; height: 155px;" /></p>

english.explanation: Using triangle properties and angle relations, solve for x and y. From triangle ABD, ∠BAD = 61°. In triangle BCD, ∠DBC = 2x - 4 and ∠DCB = 63°. Solving for x and y using isosceles triangle properties gives 2x + 5y = 268°.

hindi.explanation: AB=DB और AC=DC के कारण त्रिभुज ABD और ACD समद्विबाहु हैं। कोण DBC और DCB के मानों के आधार पर x और y के मान ज्ञात करें और 2x + 5y की गणना करें।

questions.original_question: Three numbers are in the ratio of 2&nbsp;∶ 3&nbsp;∶ 5 and their LCM is 90. Find their HCF.

english.explanation: Let the numbers be 2x, 3x, 5x. LCM is 30x = 90 ⇒ x = 3. HCF of 6, 9, 15 is 3.

hindi.explanation: माना संख्याएँ 2x, 3x, 5x हैं। LCM = 30x = 90 ⇒ x = 3. HCF = x = 3।

english.explanation: Calculate average customers per city for each service. Service Z has the highest average (297.5), corresponding to option 3.

hindi.explanation: प्रति शहर ग्राहकों की औसत गणना: सेवा X = 243.75, Y = 187.5, Z = 297.5। सेवा Z सबसे अधिक औसत है। लेकिन ऑप्शन में गलती है। सही उत्तर Z है, लेकिन दिए गए ऑप्शन में नहीं है।

questions.original_question: On simple interest a sum of Rs. 640 becomes Rs. 832 in 2 years. What will Rs. 860 become in 4 years at the same rate of simple interest?
If x +&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(\rm \frac{1}{x}=8\)</span>, then find the value of&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(\rm \frac{5}{x^2-8x+2}\)</span>.

english.explanation: Given x + 1/x = 8, square both sides to find x² + 1/x² = 62. Substitute into denominator x² - 8x + 2 = 1. Result is 5/1 = 5.

hindi.explanation: x + 1/x = 8, x² - 8x + 2 = 0। 5/(x² - 8x + 2) = 5/0 = अपरिभाषित, लेकिन विकल्प में 0 है। संभवतः त्रुटि है।

questions.original_question: The average weight of 49 students in a class is 39 kg. Seven of them whose average weight is 40 kg leave the class and other seven students whose average weight is 54 kg join the class. What is the new average weight (in kg) of the class?

english.explanation: Total initial weight = 49 * 39 = 1911 kg. Weight removed = 7 * 40 = 280 kg. Weight added = 7 * 54 = 378 kg. New total = 1911 - 280 + 378 = 2009 kg. New average = 2009 / 49 = 41 kg.
Calculate positive cases: The US = 14000 * 12% = 1680. Spain = 12000 * 8% = 960. Italy = 10000 * 12% = 1200. China = 10000 * 11% = 1100. The US has the highest.

questions.original_question: If tan A + cot A = 2, then the value of 2(tan<sup>2</sup>&nbsp;A + cot<sup>2</sup>&nbsp;A) is :

english.explanation: tanA + cotA = 2 ⇒ tanA = 1 ⇒ tan²A + cot²A = 2. Multiply by 2: 4.

hindi.explanation: tan A + cot A = 2 ⇒ tan A = 1 ⇒ tan²A = 1, cot²A = 1। 2(1 + 1) = 4।

questions.original_question: A shopkeeper gives two successive discounts on a watch marked Rs. 2,750. The first discount given is 10%. If the customer pays Rs. 2,103.75 for the watch, then what is the second discount?

english.explanation: First discount: 2750 * 0.9 = 2475. Let second discount be x%. 2475 * (1 - x/100) = 2103.75 ⇒ x = 15%.

questions.original_question: Which of the following numbers are divisible by 2, 3 and 5?

english.explanation: Check divisibility by 2, 3, 5. 2345760 ends with 0 (divisible by 2 and 5). Sum of digits: 2+3+4+5+7+6+0=27 (divisible by 3).

hindi.explanation: संख्या 2, 3, 5 से विभाज्य होने के लिए अंतिम अंक 0 होना चाहिए। योग 3 द्वारा विभाज्य होना चाहिए। 2345760 का अंत 0 है और योग 27 (3 का गुणज)।

questions.original_question: Two trains P and Q start from stations S and T towards each other. Train P takes 4 hours 48 minutes and train Q takes 3 hours 20 minutes to reach T and S, respectively, after they meet. If the speed of train P is 45 km/h, what is the speed of train Q?

english.explanation: Using relative speed formula: (45 / v)^2 = 3.333 / 4.8 ⇒ v = 54 km/h.

questions.original_question: If&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(\rm \frac{{(1 - \cos \theta )}}{{\sin \theta }}\)</span>&nbsp;=&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(\frac{1}{5}\)</span>, then what will be the value of&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(\rm \frac{{(1 + \cos \theta )}}{{\sin \theta }}\)</span>?

english.explanation: Multiply numerator and denominator by (1 + cosθ): [(1 - cosθ)(1 + cosθ)] / [sinθ(1 + cosθ)] = sin²θ / [sinθ(1 + cosθ)] = sinθ / (1 + cosθ) = 1/5 ⇒ (1 + cosθ)/sinθ = 5.

hindi.explanation: (1 - cosθ)/sinθ = 1/5 ⇒ (1 + cosθ)/sinθ = 5। पाइथागोरियन सर्वसमिका का उपयोग करें।

questions.original_question: If&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(\rm K+\frac{1}{K}=3\)</span>, then what is the value of&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(\frac{1}{K^3}+K^3\)</span>?

english.explanation: We use the identity for $K^3 +  rac{1}{K^3}$ derived from $(K +  rac{1}{K})^3$. Expanding $(K +  rac{1}{K})^3$ gives $K^3 +  rac{1}{K^3} + 3(K +  rac{1}{K})$. Substituting $K +  rac{1}{K} = 3$: $3^3 = K^3 +  rac{1}{K^3} + 3(3)$. Solving, $27 = K^3 +  rac{1}{K^3} + 9$ → $K^3 +  rac{1}{K^3} = 18$.

options.value: 179.68&nbsp;<span style="">cm</span><span style=" line-height: 0; position: relative; vertical-align: baseline; top: -0.5em; font-size:10.5px;">2</span>
163.85&nbsp;<span style="">cm</span><span style=" line-height: 0; position: relative; vertical-align: baseline; top: -0.5em; font-size:10.5px;">2</span>
145.92&nbsp;<span style="">cm</span><span style=" line-height: 0; position: relative; vertical-align: baseline; top: -0.5em; font-size:10.5px;">2</span>

hindi.explanation: दी गई आकृति में, वर्ग ABCD किसी चतुर्थांश APCQ में उत्कीर्ण है। AB = 16 सेमी है। चतुर्थांश की त्रिज्या AC वर्ग के विकर्ण के बराबर होगी। वर्ग का विकर्ण AC = AB√2 = 16√2 सेमी है। चतुर्थांश का क्षेत्रफल = (1/4)πr² = (1/4) × 3.14 × (16√2)² = 401.92 वर्ग सेमी। वर्ग का क्षेत्रफल = AB² = 256 वर्ग सेमी। छायांकित भाग का क्षेत्रफल = 401.92 - 256 = 145.92 वर्ग सेमी।
key_concepts: छायांकित क्षेत्रफल = चतुर्थांश का क्षेत्रफल - वर्ग का क्षेत्रफल

questions.original_question: O is the incentre of the triangle PQR. If angle POR = 140 degree, then what is the angle PQR?

english.explanation: The incenter divides the angles of a triangle into two equal parts. In triangle PQR, O is the incenter. Angle POR is formed between the angle bisectors of angles P and R. In triangle POR, the sum of angles is 180°, so angle POR (140°) + angle OPR (half of angle P) + angle ORP (half of angle R) = 180°. This gives (angle P + angle R)/2 = 40°, so angle P + angle R = 80°. Since the sum of all angles in triangle PQR is 180°, angle PQR = 180° - 80° = 100°.
key_concepts: Incenter divides angles into two equal parts
Sum of angles in a triangle is 180°
Using angle bisectors to relate internal angles

hindi.explanation: दिए गए त्रिभुज PQR में, O अंत:केंद्र है। ∠POR = 140° दिया गया है। अंत:केंद्र के गुणधर्म के अनुसार, कोण POR त्रिभुज के अंत:केंद्र द्वारा बनाया गया है। अंत:केंद्र पर बने कोण का सूत्र है: ∠POR = 90° + (∠Q)/2। इसे हल करने पर, 140° = 90° + (∠Q)/2 → (∠Q)/2 = 50° → ∠Q = 100°। अतः कोण PQR का मान 100 डिग्री है।
key_concepts: अंत:केंद्र त्रिभुज के कोणों के द्विभाजकों का प्रतिच्छेदन बिंदु है।
अंत:केंद्र पर बने कोण का सूत्र: ∠BIC = 90° + (∠A)/2 (जहाँ I अंत:केंद्र है)।

questions.original_question: If the side of an equilateral triangle is 20 cm, then what is its area?

options.value: 125&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(\sqrt3\)</span>&nbsp;<span style="">cm</span><span style=" line-height: 0; position: relative; vertical-align: baseline; top: -0.5em; font-size:10.5px;">2</span>

english.explanation: Statement I: The alternating sum of squares from 100² to 1² can be simplified using the difference of squares formula. Each pair (n² - (n-1)²) simplifies to 2n - 1. Summing these terms from n=100 to n=2 in steps of 2 creates an arithmetic sequence (199, 195, ..., 3) with 50 terms. The sum of this sequence is 50/2 * (199 + 3) = 5050, which matches the claim. Statement II: Solving 8x + 8/x = -16 gives x = -1. Calculating (-1)^197 + (-1)^{-197} results in -2, not 2. Thus, Statement II is false.
key_concepts: Difference of squares formula (a² - b² = (a - b)(a + b))
Arithmetic sequence sum formula (S = n/2 * (a1 + an))
Properties of exponents with negative bases

questions.original_question: If sin A =&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(\frac{4}{5}\)</span>&nbsp;and sin B =&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(\frac{15}{17}\)</span>, what is the value of sin (A - B)?

english.explanation: To find sin(A - B), we use the identity sin(A - B) = sinA cosB - cosA sinB. First, determine cosA and cosB using the Pythagorean identity. For sinA = 4/5, cosA = √(1 - (4/5)²) = 3/5. For sinB = 15/17, cosB = √(1 - (15/17)²) = 8/17. Substituting these values: sin(A - B) = (4/5)(8/17) - (3/5)(15/17) = 32/85 - 45/85 = -13/85. The correct answer is option 2.

questions.original_question: From the circumcentre L of&nbsp;&Delta;XYZ, perpendicular LM is drawn on side YZ. If&nbsp;&ang;YXZ = 60&deg;, then the measure of &ang;YLM is :

english.explanation: The circumcenter L of ΔXYZ lies at the intersection of the perpendicular bisectors. Since LM is perpendicular to YZ and L is the circumcenter, LM bisects YZ. The central angle over arc YZ is twice the inscribed angle ∠YXZ (which is 60°), making ∠YLZ = 120°. In the isosceles triangle YLZ (LY = LZ), the altitude LM divides ∠YLZ into two equal parts. Thus, ∠YLM = 120° / 2 = 60°.
key_concepts: Circumcenter as intersection of perpendicular bisectors
Central angle theorem (central angle = 2 × inscribed angle)
Properties of isosceles triangles (altitude bisects the apex angle)

hindi.explanation: ΔXYZ के परिकेन्द्र L से भुजा YZ पर लम्ब LM खींचा गया है। दिया गया है कि ∠YXZ = 60° है। परिकेन्द्र के गुणधर्मों के अनुसार, परिकेन्द्र पर केंद्रीय कोण (जैसे ∠YLZ) विपरीत चाप पर बने कोण (∠YXZ) का दोगुना होता है। इसलिए, ∠YLZ = 2 × ∠YXZ = 120° होगा। चूंकि LM, YZ पर लम्ब है और YL = LZ (परित्रिज्या), त्रिभुज YLZ एक समद्विबाहु त्रिभुज है। इस समद्विबाहु त्रिभुज में, शीर्ष कोण ∠YLZ = 120° है। लम्ब LM, इस कोण को दो बराबर भागों में विभाजित करेगा, इसलिए ∠YLM = 120° / 2 = 60° होगा।
key_concepts: केंद्रीय कोण प्रमेय (केंद्रीय कोण विपरीत चाप पर स्थित कोण का दोगुना होता है)

questions.original_question: The number of books on Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry in a University library is in the ratio 8 ∶ 5&nbsp;<span style="">∶</span> 9. There is a proposal to increase these books by 10%, 5% and 5% respectively. What will be the ratio of the number of books after increment?

key_concepts: अनुपात के भागों पर प्रतिशत वृद्धि लागू करना
समान अनुपात के लिए सामान्य गुणक ज्ञात करना

questions.original_question: Ratio between the present ages of A and B is 2&nbsp;∶ 3, respectively. After 5 years, the ratio between their ages will be 3&nbsp;∶ 4. What is B&#39;s age at present?

english.explanation: Let the present ages of A and B be 2x and 3x respectively. After 5 years, their ages will be (2x + 5) and (3x + 5). The ratio of their future ages is given as 3:4. Setting up the equation: (2x + 5)/(3x + 5) = 3/4. Cross-multiplying gives 4(2x + 5) = 3(3x + 5), which simplifies to 8x + 20 = 9x + 15. Solving for x gives x = 5. B's present age is 3x = 15 years.

To determine the student with the least aggregate marks, calculate the total marks for each student across all subjects. For student C: 48 (English) + 48 (Hindi) + 67 (Maths) = 163. Comparing totals: A=186, B=218, C=163, D=188, E=199. Student C has the lowest aggregate score.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate collocating word to fill in the blank.</strong></p>

<p>After having understood the ill effects, he said he would_______&nbsp;drinking alcohol.</p>

english.explanation: The sentence discusses stopping drinking alcohol. 'Quit' is the most appropriate collocation with 'drinking' (common phrase: 'quit drinking'). 'Finish' and 'terminate' are less idiomatic in this context, while 'close' is unrelated. The correct answer is 'quit'.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate synonym of the given word.</strong></p>

<p>Remorse</p>

english.explanation: 'Remorse' means deep regret for wrongdoing. Its synonym is 'repentance', which also refers to feeling remorse. The other options (slow, liberate, affinity) are unrelated in meaning.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate word for the underlined&nbsp;word in the given sentence.</strong></p>

<p>Rajesh was angry&nbsp;<u>at</u>&nbsp;himself for making a silly mistake during the examination.</p>

english.explanation: The phrase 'angry with' is correct when the object is oneself (reflexive context). 'Angry at' is used for external targets, but 'with' fits better here as the subject is angry toward their own mistake. 'At' is grammatically valid but 'with' is more appropriate in reflexive cases.

hindi.explanation: दिए गए वाक्य में 'angry at himself' के लिए 'at' के स्थान पर 'with' सही विकल्प है। 'Angry with' का प्रयोग जब किसी के प्रति राग का व्यक्त करते हैं, तो किया जाता है। विशेष रूप से स्वयं के प्रति राग व्यक्त करने के लिए 'angry with oneself' सही व्याकरणिक रूप है। अतः 'at' के स्थान पर 'with' ही सही है।

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Rectify the sentence by selecting the correct spelling of the underlined word.</strong></p>

<p>I would never&nbsp;<u>asc</u><u>ociate</u>&nbsp;with such a person.</p>

english.explanation: The correct spelling is 'associate'. The other options (accosiate, assosiate, asosiate) are misspellings with incorrect letter arrangements or missing letters.

questions.original_question:
<p><span style="  font-weight: 700; white-space-collapse: preserve;">Directions: Each item in this section consists of sentences with an underlined word followed by four words or group of words. Select the option that is opposite in meaning to the underlined word and mark your response on the answer sheet accordingly.</span></p>

<p>The number of tests conducted dropped further on Saturday with a total of 67,624 tests of which 20% were the less&nbsp;<u>precise</u>&nbsp;rapid antigen tests.</p>

english.explanation: 'Precise' means exact or accurate. Its antonym is 'rough', which implies imprecision or approximation. 'Complicated' and 'inevitable' are unrelated, while 'adequate' does not contrast directly with 'precise'.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Direction: In the following sentence, an idiom is highlighted. Select the alternative which best describes its use in the sentence.</strong><br />
By the end of the football match, feelings had&nbsp;<u>reached fever pitch</u>.</p>

options.value: to get so strong that one cannot control them

english.correct_answer: 2. to get so strong that one cannot control them
english.explanation: The idiom 'reached fever pitch' describes intense emotions (e.g., excitement, anger) that become uncontrollable. Options 1 and 3 refer to location or seriousness, which do not match the idiom's meaning.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the option that can be used as a one-word substitute for the given group of words.</strong></p>

<p>A speech made without preparation</p>

english.explanation: 'Extempore' directly means a prepared speech delivered without prior preparation. 'Spontaneous' is also possible but less precise as a one-word substitute compared to 'extempore'.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate meaning of the given idiom.</strong></p>

<p>To smell a rat</p>

options.value: To have reason to know the presence of a rat
To know the smell of a rat
To learn the smell of a rat

english.explanation: The idiom 'to smell a rat' means to suspect something wrong. It is unrelated to literal sense of smell. Options 1 and 3/4 are incorrect interpretations.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the correct indirect form of the given sentence.</strong></p>

<p>Priya said, &quot;Yes, I am confounded.&quot;</p>

options.value: Priya admitted that she was confound.
Priya admit that she was confounded.
Priya admitted that she was confounded.
Priya admitted that she is confounded.

english.correct_answer: 3. Priya admitted that she was confounded.
english.explanation: The reported speech must match the tense. 'Priya admitted that she was confounded' is correct (past tense). Options 1/2 use incorrect verb forms ('confound' or present tense).

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the correct passive form of the given sentence.</strong></p>

<p>People speak Cantonese in Hong-Kong.</p>

options.value: Cantonese was spoken in Hong-Kong by people.
Cantonese is being spoken in Hong-Kong.

english.explanation: The active voice 'People speak Cantonese' becomes passive as 'Cantonese is spoken', using present tense. Options 1/3 use past tense ('was') incorrectly, and option 4 uses progressive tense ('is being spoken'), which is unnecessary here.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Parts of the following sentence have been given as options. Select the option that contains an error.</strong></p>

<p>She, often, accuses him for a lack of morality.</p>

english.explanation: The correct preposition after 'accuse' is 'of', not 'for'. 'Accuses him for a lack of morality' is grammatically incorrect. This is the error in the sentence.

questions.original_question: <strong>Choose the incorrectly spelt word.</strong>

english.explanation: The correct spelling is 'Consummate'. 'Consumate' is misspelled and lacks the second 'm'. The other words are spelled correctly.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate option to substitute the underlined&nbsp;segment in the given sentence. If there is no need to substitute it, select &#39;No Substitution&#39;.</strong></p>

<p>We live in a <u>populated</u>&nbsp;country of 120 million people.</p>

english.explanation: 'Populous' means densely populated, which fits the context better than 'populated'. 'Congested' implies overcrowding, and 'dense' refers to physical density, not population.

The correct order is: 'the 2021 projections reflect growing recognition of climate change issues and the importance of nuclear power in reducing emissions from electricity generation.' The sequence P-Q-R-S forms a coherent sentence.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate ANTONYM of the underlined word in the context of its meaning in the sentence.</strong></p>

<p>A few chocolates were&nbsp;<u>left</u>&nbsp;after the Halloween&#39;s trick or treat fair.</p>

english.explanation: In context, 'left' means 'remaining'. Its antonym is 'finished', which implies nothing is left. 'Present' (option 4) is unrelated in this context.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate option to fill in the blank.</strong></p>

<p>The patient was&nbsp;<u>_______</u>&nbsp;from the hospital.</p>

english.explanation: The phrase 'discharged from the hospital' is the standard medical term for releasing a patient after treatment. 'Liberated' refers to freedom, 'let out' is informal, and 'released' is less precise in this context.

Sentence P introduces the topic (nutrient recycling by deadwood beetles). Sentence S explains their role with fungi and bacteria. Q and R provide additional roles: predation (Q) and pollination (R). The logical flow is P → S → Q → R.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the option that expresses the given sentence in active voice.</strong></p>

<p><span style="">The keys have been forgotten by Jyoti.</span></p>

options.value: <span style="">Jyotii will have forgotten the keys.</span>
Jyoti has been forgetting the keys.

english.explanation: The passive voice 'The keys have been forgotten by Jyoti' becomes active as 'Jyoti has forgotten the keys.' Option 4 matches this structure. Other options alter tense (1, 2) or use incorrect verb forms (3).

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Parts of the following sentence have been given as options. Select the option&nbsp;that contains a grammatical error.</strong></p>

<p>There was no denying the fact / that King Lear confided to / his daughter Cordelia / more than anybody else.</p>

options.value: There was no denying the fact&nbsp;

english.explanation: The verb 'confide' is transitive and does not require a preposition. 'Confided to' is incorrect; it should be 'confided in' or simply 'confided'.

questions.original_question:

english.explanation: 'Rude' is the direct antonym of 'polite.' 'Civil' and 'decent' are synonyms, while 'sober' is unrelated.
